qas.question: What offers an alternative to soft-ware only computer security?
What can hardware be a source of?
What is required in order for hardware to be compromised?
What step can increase computer security?
What is used in physical access of a computer?
What causes hardware to be insecure?
How can a cell phone increase computer security?
What physical device is used as a passkey for your computer?

plausible_answers.text: the physical access (or sophisticated backdoor access) required in order to be compromised

qas.question: Dongles less secure because of what?

plausible_answers.text: dongles, trusted platform modules, intrusion-aware cases, drive locks, disabling USB ports, and mobile-enabled access

qas.question: What is an example of software-only computer security?
What is required to compromise a software-only computer?
What type of vulnerability is hardware-based computer security impervious to?

context: While hardware may be a source of <a2_0>insecurity<a2_0/>, such as with <b6_0><b13_0>microchip<b13_0/> vulnerabilities<b6_0/> maliciously introduced <a0_0><b9_0>during the manufacturing process<b9_0/><a0_0/>, <a1_0>hardware-based or assisted computer security<a1_0/> also offers an alternative to software-only computer security. Using <b5_0>devices<b5_0/> and methods such as <b8_0><b11_0>dongles<b8_0/>, trusted platform modules, intrusion-aware cases, drive locks, disabling USB ports, and <b7_0>mobile-enabled access<b11_0/><b7_0/> may be considered more secure due to <b10_0>the <a3_0><b4_0><b12_0>physical access<b4_0/> (or sophisticated backdoor access)<b12_0/><a3_0/> required in order to be compromised<b10_0/>.
